docs.summary: Class for loading an INI file IConfigSource.
Gets the name of the current INI line.
docs.remarks:
For sections this is the name of the section.
For keys this is the name of the key.
For emtpy lines this is an empty string.
Does not return the keys necessarily in the order that they were loaded.

docs.summary: Returns true if the IniConfigSource is read only.
docs.remarks: Does not return the keys necessarily in the order that they were loaded.
